name: Fantasies Instrumental Release (Pre-Order)
description:
Estimated Release: January 2014

This is a pre-order for the Instrumental re-release of the Fantasies EP, recorded in high quality and using a range of new instruments. Each bundle features different options, details below:


EP Download - £5

CD EP - £7

Bundle:  CD EP + Release Show Ticket + Q&A Session Ticket - £10

Superfan Bundle: All of the above + New Exclusive Fantasies Poetry Piece.
£15.

*The release show will be fully instrumental, with the whole EP played through, as well as other instrumental tracks.

*The Q&A Session will follow the show and allow you to ask any questions about the music.

*The Fantasies poetry piece will reflect upon the music contained within the EP and provide some background as to what each song is about.

Thank you for your support!

Stay Bright!
n_n

HWF

options.name: Superfan Bundle (All of the above   Poetry Piece)

name: Badges & Pocket Mirrors
description:
1. High quality, glossy finish, 25mm Button Badges, with metal pins (no cheap plastic ;)) - £1 each

Available with 4 different designs, please specify your choice by leaving a 'note to seller'

From Left to Right: 

Bird Badge, (SOLD OUT)
Mountain Badge, 
Tree Badge, 
Hope Badge, (SOLD OUT)
Fantasies Badge.

Individual Badges: £1 or you can get a set of all 3 for £3.


2. Perfect as a little gift or a treat for yourself, light, high quality, pocket mirrors.

Each mirror is themed around different songs (see details below). The mirrors have a design on one side, and the mirror face on the rear. Many of the lyrics are from songs on the new album.

From Left to Right:

Rhythm Of The Tides Mirror - 'When the waves start to slip away, within hours, they'll come crashing back again'

Polaris Mirror - 'With you, I'll never walk in the dark'

In Prayer Mirror - 'Eyes will lock, Time will stop, no world will come between us'

Supernova Mirror - Featuring the artwork for the new album

Eternity Mirror - 'This Heartbeat Is Eternity'

Individual Mirrors - £3

Set of all 5 - £15 (+A free copy of my EP Fantasies)

Please specify your choice of design using the 'note to seller' section, upon checking out.

options.name: Set of 5 Mirrors with FREE EP

name: Wolf Tee
description:
Printed on Gildan Softstyle Shirts, Hope Won't Fade has teamed up with UKWCT (UK Wolf Conservation Trust), to create this t-shirt. Proceeds from every t-shirt sold will go to the UKWCT, if you'd like to find out about what they do, head here: http://ukwct.org.uk/


Available Sizes: (Chest Size)

Small: 34-36''
Medium: 38-40''
Large: 42-44''
X-Large: 46-48''

name: Past CD Releases
description:
1. A CD copy of the new album, Supernova, with 11 tracks. Includes a FREE album download. Released August 2013.

2.Deluxe CD with 2 discs, featuring 17 tracks on each. Packaged in a plastic case with a handmade lyric booklet and FREE download.
Tracklisting:
1.Transcendence
2. Cepheid
3. Bright Lights
4. Shooting Stars
5. Final Chapter
6. Polaris
7. Rhythm Of The Tides
8. In Prayer
9. Through It All
10. Shelter
11. Out There Waiting
12. Evermore
13. In Your Arms
14. Truth
15. Meant To Be
16. Rise Again
17. Roads (Instrumental)

3. A physical copy of the EP, Fantasies, released on April 12th 2013. Includes a Handmade Lyric booklet and each EP is numbered and personalized (please leave a 'note to seller' for personal requests).

*As soon as you place an order, you will be sent a FREE download of the EP immediately*

Tracklisting:
1. Distant Star (Instrumental)
2. Fantasies (Instrumental)
3. Eternity
4. Hourglass
5. Colours
6. Eyes
7. Asleep

The EP can be heard here: 
http://www.youtube.com/user/blackwolf409

Alternatively, you can also purchase an mp3 download version of the EP.

4. Physical Copy of the debut album, Out Of Reach, released July 2012. With each purchase of the album you will also receive a handmade Lyric booklet. Each album comes numbered and personalized (please leave a 'note to seller' for personal requests)
 
*As soon as you place an order, you will receive a download of the album too*

Includes 15 Tracks: 
1. Fjords (Into The Sea) 
2. Summerland (Instrumental) 
3. Card Games & Galaxies 
4. Fragments 
5. Taken Back 
6. Cards Of Fate 
7. Beyond Our Own 
8. Creeping Shadows 
9. Into My Arms 
10. Morbo Mentis 
11. Tonight 
12. Light Years 
13. The Oath (Perfect) 
14. The Calling 
15. Say Hello (To Solitude)
 
Search for the songs here: https://soundcloud.com/#hope-wont-fade

Alternatively, you can purchase an mp3 download of the album too.
